DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether dexmedetomidine effective treatment emergence deliruim sevoflurane anesthesia child cerebral palsy .
DOC.brief_title: Consequence Dexmedetomidine Emergence Deliruim After Sevoflurane Anesthesia Children With Cerebral Palsy
DOC.criteria: Nonquadriplegic ( mono , di , hemiplegic ) child CP schedule elective Achillestendon lengthening procedure Guangzhou Women Children 's Medical Center , Guangzhou , China , American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) physical status I II . Participants display symptom sinus bradycardia atrioventricular block , noncommunicative severe developmental delay , seizure disorder , treatment seizure medication
